1573940.name: God of the Arena Dungeon - Fat Rat Edition
1573940.description:
Fat Rat edition lets you unlock an ever-expanding list of new classes, access to character skins, and unique server host settings!

Here are some of the characters you can unlock with Fat Rat edition:

  • Typhoonist - A speedy mage who floats on a cloud, running and gunning while summoning high-power storm clouds!
  • Delight Knight - A jolly baker who while not clad in armor, is still technically a Knight! He summons pastries from the sky!
  • Thrownin - A rogue who has studied the blade, being able to teleport behind is foes and create bouncing blade wheels!
  • Insaninator - A corrupted bishop consumed by madness! Applies powerful effects to allies and sucks the life out of enemies!
  • Beeshop - A hermit who bee-came what he's always dreamed of: the lord of the bees and all things sticky and slick!

And many more!
